thread.title: Aphex Twin, Florence + the Machine up for UK's Mercury Prize
thread.title_full: Aphex Twin, Florence + the Machine up for UK's Mercury Prize - Times Union

author: timesunion.com
title: Aphex Twin, Florence + the Machine up for UK's Mercury Prize
text:
Photo: Chris Pizzello, AP Image 1 of / 1   1 FILE - In this Sunday, April 15, 2012 file photo Florence Welch of Florence and the Machine performs during the first weekend of the 2012 Coachella Valley Music and Arts Festival, in Indio, Calif. Former Supergrass frontman Gaz Coombes, electronica artist Aphex Twin and diva-dominated group Florence + The Machine are among 12 nominees for Britain's prestigious and unpredictable Mercury Prize for album of the year, the list announced Friday Oct. 16, 2015. FILE - In this Sunday, April 15, 2012 file photo Florence Welch of Florence and the Machine performs during the first weekend of the 2012 Coachella Valley Music and Arts Festival, in Indio, Calif. Former ... more Photo: Chris Pizzello, AP Aphex Twin, Florence + the Machine up for UK's Mercury Prize 1  /  1 Back to Gallery LONDON (AP) â€” Former Supergrass frontman Gaz Coombes , electronica artist Aphex Twin and diva-dominated group Florence + The Machine are among 12 nominees for Britain's prestigious and unpredictable Mercury Prize for album of the year.
The list, announced Friday, is dominated by solo artists, including Roisin Murphy , Jamie xx and Ghostpoet. There are only two bands among the finalists, punk act Slaves and rockers Wolf Alice.Established in 1992 and open to acts from Britain and Ireland, the prize often favors the eclectic and obscure over better-known performers.
Some winners, including Arctic Monkeys and Elbow, have gone on to mainstream fame, while others have failed to break through.
This year's winner of the 20,000 pounds ($32,000) prize will be announced Nov. 20.
